name: Zzorp!
description:
Play as a llama and fight off coyotes and chickens as you navigate to the end of a level. There are 5 levels which scale in difficulty from easiest to hardest. 

Move with the "A" and "D" keys, jump with "Space," shoot with left click, and reload with either the "R" key or right click.

View "_README - INSTRUCTIONS" for info on how to run the game.

Developed 2022 by Xander Tooze, AJ Kazazian, Jonathan Luke, Kevin McNulty, and Mark Grimké
